楟字的基本解释

楟
tíng
山梨。

楟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tíng］
［《廣韻》特丁切，平青，定。］
果木名。山梨。

楟字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　楟； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页540第10
【唐韻】唐丁切【玉篇】徒丁切，?音亭。【唐韻】木名。山梨也。【左思·吳都賦】橙?梬楟。又【孝子傳】尹伯奇采楟花以爲食。【註】楟花，卽棠梨花。春開，采暴乾，瀹之可充蔬。　又【博雅】楟刺也。

楟字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
楟字的起名意思

果木名。山梨。

[①]［tíng］
["Guangyun" special Dingqie, Pingqing, Ding. ]
Fruit tree name. Yamanashi.
Tong
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　楟; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 540 No. 10
[Tang Yun] Tang Dingqie [Jade articles] Dingqie as a student, Yinting. [Tang Yun] Wooden name. Yamanashi too. 【Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu】Orange? 梬楟. Also [The Biography of a Dutiful Son] Yin Boqi picks tuna flowers for food. [Note] Tulipa flower, pear flower. The spring blooms, the harvest is violently dried, and it can be filled with vegetables.　[Bo Ya] Tingting also.
